0x280F1FC3.name: GET_PED_DRAWABLE_GLOBAL_INDEX_FROM_COLLECTION

params.name: collection
params.description: Name of the collection. Empty string for the base game collection. See [GET_PED_COLLECTION_NAME](#\_0xFED5D83A) in order to list all available collections.

params.name: drawableId
params.description: Local drawable Id inside the given collection. Refer to [GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS](#\_0x310D0271).

0x280F1FC3.description:
Returns global drawable index based on the local one. Is it a reverse to [GET_PED_COLLECTION_NAME_FROM_DRAWABLE](#\_0xD6BBA48B) and [GET_PED_COLLECTION_LOCAL_INDEX_FROM_DRAWABLE](#\_0x94EB1FE4) natives.

Drawables are stored inside collections. Each collection usually corresponds to a certain DCL or the base game.

If all drawables from all collections are placed into one continuous array - the global index will correspond to the index of drawable in such array. Local index is index of drawable in this array relative to the start of the given collection.
0x280F1FC3.resultsDescription: Global drawable ID that corresponds to the given collection and local drawable index. Returns -1 if Ped or collection does not exist or local index is out of bounds.
